name: Compromise of a Network Perimeter Device – Containment
description:
# 🌐 Compromise of a Network Perimeter Device – Containment

---

## 🎯 Purpose

Rapidly implement containment actions to:

* Isolate the compromised device
* Restrict traffic flows
* Apply vendor updates and recommendations
* Preserve evidence for investigation

---

## 📌 **Objectives**

✅ **Network actions**
    1. Isolate the device
    2. Filter traffic as much as possible
    3. Isolate the vulnerable service

✅ **System actions**
    4. Update the device
    5. Change compromised secrets
    6. Apply vendor mitigation measures

✅ **Evidence preservation**
    7. Back up system data
    8. Preserve logs

---

## 📄 Resource

👉 [Full playbook – CERT-FR](https://www.intercert-france.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/fichereflexe-compromissionequipementbordurereseau-endiguement.pdf)

tasks.title: Measure 6 - Apply mitigation measures
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective
Fix vulnerabilities and **mitigate**.
### 📌 Actions
- Update/patch; Apply the risk reduction measures proposed by the manufacturer
- **Change compromised secrets** (local/admin/API)
### ✅ Deliverables
+ Equipment sanitized
+ Log in the **activities** of this task the actions performed.

tasks.title: Measure 7/8 - Preserve system data & logs
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective
Preserve evidence.
### 📌 Actions
- Preserve the system state in order to analyze it
- Backup **config**, system state; export **logs**
### ✅ Deliverables
+ Evidence set exported and added to the incident files

tasks.title: Measure 2 - Filter traffic
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective
Restrict the attack surface and limit external communications
### 📌 Actions
- Limit the exposed surface
- Disable **non-essential services**, remove unnecessary exposure
- Filter outbound traffic from the equipment
- **Allowlists** on remaining services; filter **outbound traffic** initiated by the equipment
### ✅ Deliverables
+ Filtering applied
+ List of filtered flows documented in the **activities** of this task

tasks.title: Measure 4 - Patch vulnerabilities
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective
Implement security fixes
### 📌 Actions
- Apply the correction procedure proposed by the vendor
- This measure should only be performed if your edge equipment is affected by a vulnerability for which a patch that you are able to apply is available.
### ✅ Deliverables
+ Patch applied (if possible)
+ Log in the **activities** of this task the actions performed.

tasks.title: Closure & return to service
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective
Return to **controlled** service.
### 📌 Actions
- Security validation, testing, post-restoration monitoring
### ✅ Deliverables
Controlled return + monitoring

tasks.title: Measure 3 - Isolate the vulnerable service
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective
Make the vulnerable service inaccessible
### 📌 Actions
- Disable the vulnerable service
- If impossible, filter incoming traffic to the port exposing the vulnerable service
### ✅ Deliverables
+ Vulnerable service inaccessible
+ Log in the **activities** of this task the actions performed.

tasks.title: Measure 1 - Isolate the equipment
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective
Reduce immediate exposure.
### 📌 Actions
- Isolate the suspected compromised machine
- Isolation via switch/firewall; otherwise **physical disconnection**; otherwise local configuration
- Attention if **VPN gateway**: preserve **secops** access
### ✅ Deliverables
+ Equipment isolated
+ Log in the **activities** of this task the actions performed.

tasks.title: Measure 5 - Change potentially compromised secrets
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective
Change potentially compromised secrets
### 📌 Actions
- Change the secrets used by the attacker
- Change the secrets potentially used by the attacker
- Identify and renew the secrets made accessible by the compromise
### ✅ Deliverables
+ Secrets changed
+ List of changed secrets documented in the **activities** of this task
